description: TerminatingGatewaySpec defines the desired state of TerminatingGateway

services.description: Services is a list of service names represented by the terminating gateway.

items.description: A LinkedService is a service represented by a terminating gateway

caFile.description: CAFile is the optional path to a CA certificate to use for TLS connections from the gateway to the linked service.

certFile.description: CertFile is the optional path to a client certificate to use for TLS connections from the gateway to the linked service.

keyFile.description: KeyFile is the optional path to a private key to use for TLS connections from the gateway to the linked service.

name.description: Name is the name of the service, as defined in Consul's catalog.

namespace.description: The namespace the service is registered in.

sni.description: SNI is the optional name to specify during the TLS handshake with a linked service.
